titles.title: A bill for the relief of Nebraska Aluminum Castings, Inc., of Hastings, Nebraska.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 12/18/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named Nebraska corporation in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States arising out of the preparation of a proposal in response to a U.S. Army procurement solicitation.
